item.title: Backup MySQL Databases in Kubernetes
item.description: In this post, we will show you how to create a MySQL server backup using Kubernetes CronJobs. In our case, we do not have a managed MySQL server. But we want to backup it to our NAS, so that we have a backup in case of emergency. For this we first build a container that can execute our tasks, because we will certainly need several tasks to backup our cluster.
